title: Eric and Leila's Story
description: What is in this book?Well let’s see,Drama,Hierarchy,Hot Romance,Sexy Rock Stars,Werewolves and other shifters,A perfectly blended family of unwanted misfits,And a beautiful heroin who doesn’t take any crap. Want to see how I tie all these descriptions together? Well, what can I say? Read the book!
author: S.A. Dennison
